resources.string: Your data is processing please wait
Please close your eyes and wait for 30 secs.We will calcute your baseline brain activity.
A few notes for a Alpha Mind...

Welcome to Application! Just relax and observe your mindfulness.We will help you to fell have more calmed with meditations. First, process your current mind state and then choose a meditation. Take into account instructions.Then start the journey!
Close your eyes , Please breath in a count of 2 and breath out in a count of 3. Please continue for 30 secs.
Close your eyes and try to relax. If thoughts will try to pull your attention away, notice them but do not get stuck on them. Please continue for 30 secs.

Close your eyes ,Imagine yourself in a safe, soothing natural environment like a sunny beach or wooded forest, where you can tune in to the sights, sounds and smells of that special place. You are free to roam around this space and see what arises in your mind. Please continue for 30 secs.
